title: Omega Rabbit And Alpha Wolf
alternative_title: Omega Rabbit and Alpha Wolf ; Usagi Reijou to Ookami Reisoku ; うさぎ令嬢とオオカミ令息 ; 兔小姐与狼少爷 ; 兔小姐與狼少爺
status: Omega Rabbit and Alpha Wolf ; Usagi Reijou to Ookami Reisoku ; うさぎ令嬢とオオカミ令息 ; 兔小姐与狼少爷 ; 兔小姐與狼少爺
description:
Description :
        Chapter 1: Set in a world where there men and women, herbivores and carnivores, and the three genders of the omega-verse. Alpha, Beta, and Omega.

Owen, an alpha wolf and the son of a duke, and Amelia, an omega rabbit and the daughter of an earl, are engaged for an arranged political marriage. However, due to a traumatic experience in the past, Amelia is a recluse who has a serious aversion to alpha males.

Having fallen in love with Amelia at first sight, Owen tries his best to get closer to her, but...

The story of how a quiet, unsociable (but kind) guy and a crybaby, former shut-in girl get together.

Chapter 2: Owen and Amelia are gradually becoming acquainted with one another and are growing closer when...
Amelia suddenly and unexpectedly enters heat when the two of them are alone together in the mansion!
